value:
I love the ocean, especially during
the summer.$k$pUgh, I thought I could trick myself
into not hating this, but nothing
seems to be working...

So you say my usual garb looks
like a swimsuit? Heh. It's designed
to amplify my curses, fool.

Dark mages live in shadow, so going
to the beach in summer is akin to
entering a nightmarish hellscape.

While they're distracted by my
swimsuit, I'll strike with a curse...
Hmhm, they'll never see it coming...

This accursed sun... Perhaps I'll cast
a hex to ensure it never rises again!
I'm joking, obviously...

I bring glad summer tidings from
$Nf...$k$pYou know I'll curse you into oblivion
if you keep staring, right?

Not even the beach can weaken my
curses. You know that all too well,
don't you, Summoner?

Dark forces, hear my plea... May their
feet be caught in endless algae during
their next swim...

Ugh, this place is infuriatingly bright...
Of course my curses wouldn't work
here, you fool.

Heehee... Surely this will be
enough to grab Robin's attention...

I'm Tharja, a dark mage from Plegia.
Why would you bring me to such an
annoyingly bright place?

I was born and raised in Plegia, a
desert country, so I never had much
interaction with the sea.$k$pHow surprising that I'm now at the
beach and even dressed the part.
Fate is truly mysterious...$k$pI considered cursing you for dragging
me to the ocean, but I suppose I shall
let the offense go this time...$k$pAfter all, who is to say that is not the
will of fate as well? As it was when
Robin and I met.$k$pI might even see Robin here, and
we must take every opportunity to
grow closer...$k$pI will cast a spell that makes me shine
brighter than the sun! Hmhmhm, my
love will have no choice but to stare...
Oh no, a wave...
Watch that undertow...
Enjoying the view?
Outswim this hex!
I hate the beach...
This outfit, the "fresh air"... Does it look like I'd be having a good time here?
*gasp* What? Oh...a drink? You can just hand me things normally, you know.
It is said that fashioning a talisman out of these shells will lead to love... It had better work.
It's absolutely sweltering! If only there were a curse to freeze over the blasted sun...
Loves me not, loves me, loves me not, wha— Hmph. Well, at least it looks like this lush foliage will supply me with endless petals.
The sea breeze actually feels pretty nice...
Perhaps I could spare some time to walk the beach with you—a-after dark, obviously.
Too hot...
Get on with it.
Robin? Oh.
